Job Title: Senior Microbiology Scientist, Qpex BioPharma, wholly-owned subsidiary of Shionogi Inc. in San Diego, CA

Location: San Diego, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
Qpex Biopharma is seeking a Senior Scientist to join our dynamic antibiotic development team. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in advancing our efforts to discover and develop novel antibiotics to address antibiotic resistance.

Key Responsibilities

Assist in the design, planning, and execution of experiments to investigate and optimize antibiotic compounds.Utilize advanced molecular genetics techniques to analyze mechanisms of action for potential antibiotic candidates.Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including medicinal chemists, microbiologists, and pharmacologists, to contribute to the overall drug discovery process.Stay abreast of current literature and emerging trends in antibiotic development to inform and enhance research strategies.Contribute to the preparation and submission of regulatory documents as required for drug development programs.Maintain accurate and detailed laboratory records, ensuring compliance with industry standards and protocols.Contribute to the publication of research findings in scientific journals and presentations at conferences.

Supervisory Responsibilities

This role will eventually have direct reports

Qualifications

PhD in Microbiology, Molecular Biology or a related field.Demonstrated expertise in molecular geneticsMinimum 2 years’ experience in microbiology and molecular genetics research, with a proven track record of scientific contributions in the fieldExpertise in a range of molecular genetics techniques, including gene disruption, gene expression, sequence analysis.Knowledge of drug discovery processes, including assay development and high-throughput screening.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret complex data sets.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a multidisciplinary team.Ability to travel (approximately 10%).

To be considered for this position, you must apply and meet the requirements of this opportunity.

We Look Forward To Reviewing Your Resume & Qualifications.

The base salary range for this full-time position is $110,000 - $130,000 annually. This salary range is an estimate and may vary based on the Company’s compensation practices.

DISCLAIMER

The job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of requirements, duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee. Other requirements, duties and responsibilities may change or be assigned at any time with or without notice.

EEO 

Qpex Biopharma Inc. is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer.

All qualified applicants will receive equal consideration for employment opportunities based on valid job requirements without regard to race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, national origin, age, ancestry, citizenship, disability, genetic information, status as a protected veteran or any other characteristic protected by applicable law.

It is the policy of Qpex Biopharma Inc. to undertake affirmative action in compliance with all federal, state, and local requirements to recruit a diverse pool of applicants and to ensure that our employment practices are, in fact, non-discriminatory.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
